site.name: Robot Framework Libraries
site.description: Comprehensive collection of Robot Framework libraries for various use cases
site.author: Org / Team Name

libraries.name: StringUtils
libraries.description: A comprehensive string manipulation library providing powerful keywords for text processing, pattern matching, validation, encoding, hashing, and data transformation operations.
libraries.author: Bruce Wayne

libraries.name: DataProcessor
libraries.description: A comprehensive data processing library for validation, transformation, and manipulation of JSON data structures with advanced filtering and merging capabilities.
libraries.author: Mary Jane

libraries.name: FileUtils
libraries.description: File and directory operations library providing comprehensive file system utilities for reading, writing, copying, and managing files and directories.
libraries.author: Jane Smith

libraries.name: HTTPClient
libraries.description: HTTP client library for making REST API calls, handling authentication, and managing HTTP requests and responses with support for GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE operations.
libraries.author: Peter Parker

libraries.name: DBUtils
libraries.description: Database utilities library for executing SQL queries, managing database connections, and handling transactions with support for common database operations.
libraries.author: Tony Stark

libraries.name: DateTimeUtils
libraries.description: Date and time utilities library providing comprehensive operations for date parsing, formatting, calculations, comparisons, and timezone handling with support for timestamps and calendar operations.
libraries.author: Black Widow
